snippet.title: Shu - Launch Trailer | PS4, PS Vita, PC
snippet.description:
Shu is a beautiful and engrossing platformer that we’re bringing to PC and consoles with our friends at Secret Lunch.

Control Shu and a colourful trail of hand-drawn characters as they run, jump and glide their way up an ancient mountain, forever pursued by a monstrous and unrelenting storm.

Can you outrun the end of the world?

Buy now on PS4: https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-gb/games/shu/cid=EP8936-CUSA04583_00-COATSINKSHUPS400

Buy now on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/528720/

www.coatsink.com/games/shu
www.facebook.com/shugame
www.twitter.com/shuthegame

#ShuGame
